Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pTgtDir
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Log file directory. (Blank = from TM1 configuration file)

Parameters.Name: pLogDays
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: The number of days to retain log Files

Parameters.Name: pErrorDays
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: The number of day to retain TM1 Error Logs

Parameters.Name: pBedrockDays
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: The number of days to retain Bedrock Debug Files

Parameters.Name: pCSVDays
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: The number of days to retain CSV files
